data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":null,"id":452572,"title":"L'isola del tesoro","original_title":"L'isola del tesoro","overview":"","poster_path":"/bZ9H2msN6GgHPcfmfLaDralZM3a.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[],"popularity":0.076,"release_date":"1987-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":2},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":11292,"title":"Girl's Life, Boy's World","original_title":"Seventeen - Mädchen sind die besseren Jungs","overview":"At seventeen, girls are all about looking good, dressing right and making out with the cutest boys. Or they're like Luka, who's an ace in boxing and couldn't care less about her looks or her appeal to boys. When she breaks a schoolmate's nose, her parents send her off to boarding school to acquire some ladylike manners. There she's mistaken for Frankie, a boy who hasn't shown up, and takes on his identity. With her boxing skills, she instantly wins over her three roommates Chico, Toby and Jo, and strikes up a particularly close friendship with Chico. Her uncompromising honesty and loyalty to her new friends, however, soon get her into trouble with the headmistress and her nephew, the school bully.","poster_path":"/oUgbUWfPlAQhKLPnX6N9gAjKkvJ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"de","genre_ids":[35,10770],"popularity":2.402,"release_date":"2003-02-06","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":10},{"backdrop_path":"/895PZCDt66XoreAcXCgWDQ3gmY3.jpg","id":222051,"title":"The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones: Demons of Deception","original_title":"The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones: Demons of Deception","overview":"In the ninth film in the series, in September 1916, young Indiana Jones - going by the alias of \"Henri Defense\" - has become a motorcycle courier stationed near the trenches at Verdun. His friend Remy is still in the trenches, and both grow more disillusioned about the war each day. Chosen to sneak into enemy territory on account of his gift for languages, Indy overhears German officers speaking of the imminent arrival of their most powerful artillery guns, nicknamed \"Big Bertha.\" A month later, Indy and Remy are granted leave to Paris, where Indiana meets the exotic dancer Mata Hari at a dinner party. He falls for her immediately, but soon finds out she is dating other men as well, including the French Minister of War.","poster_path":"/i3zDb6JcGtAlx6Wt0JdLUN3xzRU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,12,10752,10770],"popularity":8.475,"release_date":"1999-10-31","video":true,"vote_average":5.571,"vote_count":14},{"backdrop_path":"/btmQVS7TGeXDOFPfh8Adv46oYX.jpg","id":42658,"title":"Helen of Troy","original_title":"Helen of Troy","overview":"Prince Paris of Troy, shipwrecked on a mission to the king of Sparta, meets and falls for Queen Helen before he knows who she is. Rudely received by the royal Greeks, he must flee...but fate and their mutual passions lead him to take Helen along.
